resources.string: Use your phones flashlight as Torch to use in the dark. There are similar apps but this one is 100% free - without ads.
By default Flashlight will turn On. This Button will be displayed only when Flashlight is On, Touch this button to Turn Off flashlight.
This Button will be displayed only when Flashlight is Off, Touch this button to Turn On flashlight.
By default it is unchecked, when you tick or check this box Flashlight will run in the background ie: after locked, screen off, viewing other apps
